Nightlight:

"Yes I'm "said the femme "Hold on, I'm go to speak with someon=

n"

hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2007 11:25 PM

evng G2


  ::Hevn::

  Hevn: I'm alive and well. I'm at the main entrance =
to the Maximal base in the city. is that where you are located?

  Airshado=
w <airly2002@...> wrote:

    Nightligjt:

    "Hevn????"Answered s=
upriced the femme"Are you alive?" she added with some alarm "Hevn try to co=

ter staff member in order allow you the entrace"

      ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
      From: Richard Allen 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
   Sent: Monday, November 26, 2007 10:52 AM
      Subject: Hevng G2


     =
 ::Hevng::

      The clone of Nightlight's former bodyguard fought through=
 the terrain and weather for sometime before eventually arriving at Atlanti=
s. He transforms to robot mode and would read as a Maximal. No one could kn=
ow that he was a clone being controlled by Lord Jhiaxus of the G2 Deceptico=
n Empire. Hevng walks into the open areas of the city before coming to the =
Maximal base. He opens a comm channel on an old personal channel used by Ro=
dimus' family and friends.

      Hevng: Nightlight, do you read?
